Higiya —
WordPress website.

Role / Services

UI / UX Design

Development

Deploying

Client

Higiya — Medical Center

Location & Year

Bulgaria, 2022

Case Study

Introduction

As a web developer, I was approached by Higiya Medical Clinic to create a new website for their practice. The clinic wanted a website that was professional and easy to navigate, and that would help them attract new patients.

Objective

The main objective of the project was to create a website that would serve as a reliable source of information for current and potential patients, and that would be visually appealing and easy to use.

The Process

I started by working with the clinic to understand their needs and preferences, as well as their target audience. I then designed a layout for the website, using responsive design techniques to ensure that it would display correctly on all devices.
During the development process, I focused on creating a user-friendly experience for the website's visitors. This included organizing the content in a logical and easy-to-navigate manner, and incorporating features such as click-to-call buttons and maps for directions.

The Result

The final website was a success, meeting all of the clinic's objectives and receiving positive feedback from patients. The website has helped the clinic attract new patients and effectively communicate important information to its audience.

Conclusion

By working closely with the client and focusing on creating a user-friendly experience, I was able to deliver a professional website that met the needs of Higiya Medical Clinic. The project was a great example of the importance of considering the needs of the end user in the design and development process.
